title: Exquisite Emerald and CZ Kasu Mala: A Rani Haar Fit for Royalty
materials: Crafted with a base of high-quality alloy and plated with gold. Adorned with vibrant emerald green stones
and simulated pearls. Features a delicate
Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This stunning long haram (kasu mala) showcases a classic South Indian design with meticulously set emeralds and CZ stones. The intricate floral motifs along the chain lead to a majestic pendant featuring emeralds and CZ stones in a paisley-inspired design. The cascading simulated pearls add a touch of elegance and movement. This piece blends the grandeur of traditional Rani Haar designs with modern refinement.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant emerald green gemstones
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Sankranthi or Diwali. It's also a statement piece for special events where you want to showcase your appreciation for South Indian heritage.
description: This exquisite Kasu Mala combines the timeless allure of South Indian jewelry with a touch of modern elegance. The high-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty, while the vibrant emeralds and sparkling CZ stones capture attention. Its traditional design makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, offering both cultural significance and enduring style. A true heirloom piece! Designed with meticulous detail and fine craftsmanship making this necklace a lasting, beautiful addition to any jewelry collection.
